column1: Only one here for a Transportation hearing on rail workers impacted by COVID... Where is Congress? We must get back to work. This is imperative for the American people. https://t.co/Mznwwa2mHO

🚨 Attention Hoosier Veterans:   The @DeptVetAffairs will be hosting a tele-town hall on COVID-19 response launch of Blue Water Navy Act & Solid Start program + more.   ✔️ August 26 ✔️ 4pmET ✔️ Call: 833-380-0417

When China unleashed COVID-19 unto the world @realDonaldTrump saved countless lives with his temporary travel ban.   The #NoBanAct would undermine President Trump's authority in protecting our country's national security.   We must not limit this authority & responsibility.

COVID-19 was unleashed onto the world by China.    @SpeakerPelosi now sides with Communist China by calling it the "Trump Virus."  Nancy we’re both old enough to know what I mean when I say you’ve officially “jumped the shark.”

Friendly reminder to Hoosiers across #IN06:   If you have any questions or concerns please visit https://t.co/fIXUz2cU9t & send me an email!   Whether it's latest resources on COVID-19 assistance w/ a federal program or inquiries on federal legislation: my team & I serve you.

Hoosier farmers impacted by COVID-19:   The Coronavirus Food Assistance Program provides DIRECT relief to producers who faced price declines & supply chain disruptions caused by COVID.  @USDA is accepting applications through 8/28/2020. ⬇️   https://t.co/inVnWBf4Tu

NEW:   The Hoosier State is receiving nearly $4 Million from @HHSGov for rural health centers to support #COVID19 testing.   With support from Congress the @realDonaldTrump Admin is prioritizing rural communities in #IN06 and across the nation. 🇺🇸  https://t.co/MhPp138FMD
(5/5) America is in the midst of a crisis - the People need solutions not a partisan wish list that predates Coronavirus. Americans deserve better.  #PelosiPowerGrab

On this #NationalDayofPrayer Americans find strength in faith and are reminded of God’s love for us all. I ask you to join me in prayer for our great Nation and our leaders as we unite in defeating COVID-19. https://t.co/1kfmyJztoo

(2/4) While our nation continues to fight #COVID19 @SpeakerPelosi & her Democrat colleagues are using this pandemic to push proxy voting through the U.S. House of Representatives to consolidate power among Washington's elite powerbrokers & further away from the American People.

To the truck drivers equipment operators flight crews and all other essential personnel in transportation & infrastructure: God bless you our country thanks you! As our nation battles #COVID19 your work and sacrifice is noticed and appreciated. #ToThoseWhoKeepUsMoving https://t.co/CfXU72ncUx

Hoosier Farmers: @USDA is supporting YOU w/ the #Coronavirus Food Assistance Program.   Thanks to @realDonaldTrump for unwavering support of the ag community 🇺🇸   ➡️ $9.5B to cattle dairy & hog farmers  ➡️ $3.9B to row crops  ➡️ $2.1B to specialty crops  https://t.co/tSySuVC551

Hoosier business owners & employers are suffering because of #COVID19. They rely on #PPP to help them stay afloat during this unprecedented challenge our country faces. D.C. Democrats must STOP blocking funding to #PPP - the political games are unacceptable.

Applications for the #COVID19 telehealth program are OPEN ✅   Without access to broadband or telehealth infrastructure rural communities can be left behind. This program is a big step from @FCC in supporting rural America.   https://t.co/tkQgfg2SOD

The @realDonaldTrump Administration is working with Congress to keep American families healthy and guide our country back to prosperity.   Nearly $669 Million has been delivered to Indiana hospitals to bolster the battle against #COVID19.   #CARESAct   https://t.co/WUPUK1Sn5Q

NEW from @FEMA: A second confirmed shipment from Strategic National Stockpile is headed to Indiana ➡️  •185000 N95 masks •440000 surgical masks •87000 face shields •348000 gloves & more...  The @realDonaldTrump Admin is committed to helping Hoosiers defeat #COVID19.

God bless the brave Americans working to vanquish #COVID19.  From doctors & nurses on the frontlines to the whole-of-government approach everyone is in this fight.   In the face of a challenge we always unite as one.   #InItTogether   Read my oped: https://t.co/2Onrt22GwC

.@realDonaldTrump is supporting American workers & businesses impacted by Coronavirus.   The #PaycheckProtectionProgram prioritizes millions of Americans + small businesses by authorizing up to $349 Billion toward job retention.   Apply online TODAY ➡️ https://t.co/7RNohQIFto

Thank you to selfless nurses doctors scientists & food supply workers on the front lines.  #COVID-19 has changed our world but our fighting spirit is stronger than this virus.  We are blessed to have @realDonaldTrump & @Mike_Pence lead our nation through this challenge. https://t.co/Uoqn21jBAp

Yesterday I drove from Columbus IN —> D.C. to be a voice for Hoosiers who need relief from #COVID19 now.   I support @realDonaldTrump’s fight for the health & prosperity of the American people.   We can’t afford to wait another minute. Let’s do our job & get it done! https://t.co/x0DsEMZnwF

(1/2) I’m here in my district my bags are packed and I’m ready to be in D.C. to vote to protect the American people from the destruction of this #COVIDー19 pandemic but @SpeakerPelosi continues to play the ideological opportunism game -

The American people need action. Right now our nation needs leadership not politics. It is shocking & completely irresponsible for @SpeakerPelosi & @SenSchumer to torpedo a bipartisan bill that would provide relief for families & our suffering economy plagued by #Coronavirus. https://t.co/ta6ZfKeFgM

Here in Columbus working from home speaking round the clock w/ local health officials & leaders from the private sector. Important discussions about how we can overcome challenges we face from Coronavirus.   The American spirit is strong we will prevail.   #InItTogether https://t.co/LChfZ5KI4r

Thank you President @realDonaldTrump for signing the Coronavirus relief package into law!   ✔️ Free testing  ✔️ Support for small businesses  ✔️ 2 weeks paid sick leave  ✔️ Wider access to unemployment insurance   We are all #InItTogether and will overcome this challenge. 🇺🇸

At a time when our nation’s leaders needed to put politics aside and come together on solutions this week @HouseDemocrats decided to play political games and put forth ridiculous partisan legislation to address #Coronavirus.

We are the strongest country in the world with the hardest working scientists & doctors & the most innovative minds. The health of the American people is priority. @realDonaldTrump has done the right thing by declaring a #NationalEmergency in light of the Coronavirus pandemic.

Last week Congress passed over $8 Billion in emergency funding quickly signed into law by President @realDonaldTrump to combat #coronavirus.   This $$ will:   ✅ Speed development of vaccines ✅ Bolster access to testing & treatments ✅ Expand access to telemedicine services https://t.co/414HEQ7jmH
